name: demo-app
description: Full-stack monorepo with React Native mobile app, React web app, and Supabase backend

scripts.mobile:clean: pkill -f 'metro' || true && pkill -f 'expo' || true && lsof -ti:8081 | xargs kill -9 || true
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:supabase" "npm run mobile" "npm run web"
scripts.gen:types:staging: supabase gen types typescript --project-id $STAGING_PROJECT_REF > apps/mobile/src/types/database.ts && cp apps/mobile/src/types/database.ts apps/web/src/types/database.ts
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:db
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:mobile && npm run test:unit:web && npm run test:unit:shared
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:web && npm run test:e2e:mobile
scripts.test:e2e:web: export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.maestro/bin" && maestro test tests/e2e/web/flows/home.yaml --env WEB_URL="${WEB_URL:-http://localhost:5173}" --env TEST_EMAIL="${TEST_EMAIL:-e2e-test-$(date +%s)@example.com}" --env TEST_PASSWORD="${TEST_PASSWORD:-TestPassword123!}"
scripts.test:e2e:mobile: export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.maestro/bin" && maestro test tests/e2e/mobile/flows/home.yaml --env MOBILE_APP_ID="${MOBILE_APP_ID:-com.anonymous.beakerstack}" --env TEST_EMAIL="${TEST_EMAIL:-e2e-test-$(date +%s)@example.com}" --env TEST_PASSWORD="${TEST_PASSWORD:-TestPassword123!}"
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd apps/mobile && npm run test:watch" "cd apps/web && npm run test:watch" "cd packages/shared-tests && npm run test:web -- --watch" "cd packages/shared-tests && npm run test:native -- --watch"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:mobile && npm run test:coverage:web && npm run test:coverage:shared && npm run test:coverage:merge
scripts.lint: npm run lint:mobile; npm run lint:web; npm run lint:shared
scripts.lint:strict: npm run lint:mobile -- --max-warnings 0 && npm run lint:web -- --max-warnings 0 && npm run lint:shared -- --max-warnings 0
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:mobile; npm run type-check:web; npm run type-check:shared
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/dist apps/*/build
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && supabase stop && docker system prune -f

author: Artificer Innovations, LLC
